## Experiments & Components

Interactive UI components and experiments available at https://avikmukherjee.me/experiments:

- **Animated Counter** (https://avikmukherjee.me/experiments/animated-counter): A smooth animated number counter with spring physics. Perfect for dashboards, stats displays, and gamification elements. Features: Spring-based animation physics, customizable duration and easing, supports formatting (commas, decimals), accessible with reduced motion support. Dependencies: motion.

- **Magnetic Button** (https://avikmukherjee.me/experiments/magnetic-button): A button that responds to cursor proximity with a magnetic pull effect. Creates an engaging, playful interaction. Features: Smooth cursor-following animation, customizable magnetic strength, works with any child content, touch-device compatible. Dependencies: motion.

- **Text Scramble** (https://avikmukherjee.me/experiments/text-scramble): A text effect that scrambles characters before revealing the final text. Great for headers and loading states. Features: Customizable scramble characters, adjustable animation speed, trigger on mount or hover, supports any text content.

- **Spotlight Card** (https://avikmukherjee.me/experiments/spotlight-card): A card component with a dynamic spotlight effect that follows the cursor. Creates depth and visual interest. Features: Cursor-following spotlight, customizable spotlight color and size, smooth gradient transitions, works with any card content.

- **Typewriter Effect** (https://avikmukherjee.me/experiments/typewriter): A classic typewriter animation with blinking cursor. Perfect for hero sections and introductions. Features: Adjustable typing speed, optional blinking cursor, delete and retype support, multiple text sequences.

- **Experiment Item** (https://avikmukherjee.me/experiments/experiment-item): A list item component with hover-activated corner markers. Features smooth transitions and minimalist design perfect for showcasing experiments or projects. Features: Hover-activated corner markers, smooth CSS transitions, minimalist design, dark mode support, accessible and keyboard-friendly.

All experiments include:
- Live interactive previews
- Full source code with syntax highlighting
- MDX export functionality
- Integration with AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Scira AI, v0)
- Component documentation and usage examples
